===============

### Tender Title

F1705-230706: Tug and Barge Services - Aids to Navigation

2024-01-10T14:00:00

None (as of now)

### Tender Status

### UNSPSC

78141701

### Tender Description

The Canadian Coast Guard is inviting bids for tug and barge services to improve existing Aids to Navigation (AtoN) and helipad replacement in Haida Gwaii and the BC coast. The contractor will provide tug, barge, and equipment services to assist the Canadian Coast Guard construction crews. The project entails mobilizing from Victoria, BC to the BC coast staging locations, with planned execution in February and March of 2024.

### Regions of Delivery

The region of delivery is British Columbia, Canada.

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5.

### End-user Entity

The end-user entity is the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6.

### Contact Information

Mary (SPAC/PSPC) cannot be reached for updates on the project. However, bids can be submitted via the provided [link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18208958?extsite=MTgyMDg5NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Please note that any technical issues regarding bids must be directed to Mary Parson at *mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca*. Bid submission deadline was January 10, 2024. Only two candidates were selected, and Aqaside Inc was awarded the project. The interactions on this question are now closed.
With regards, [Contractor Internal Client Name].
